raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "Projection", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "Projection is a defense mechanism in which an individual attributes their own unacceptable thoughts or feelings to someone else. This is classic projection.", "evidence_quality": "normal"}
